All Classes

Class
Description
Card
Class to create standard playing card objects.
Card.Rank
Enum for the different ranks that a standard playing card can be.
Card.Suit
Enum for the different French suits that a standard playing card can be.
ConnectionSetup
Handles data player name and room code for a game session.
Dealer
Class for creating dealers.
Deck
Class to create a deck object from standard playing cards.
ErrorRes
Class used to handle custom written error messages.
GameConnection
A class that manages the connection to the client and the player data associated with it
GameModel
Class that holds data for a game.
GameTracker
Class that keeps track of the current game of blackjack.
Hand
Class to create a hand of standard playing cards.
Main
The main class that initializes the server
Player
Class for creating players.
RecievingCmd
Class that handles commands to the server.
Room
This class acts as an instance game of blackjack and handles all the actions requested while updating a GameTracker object accordingly.
RoomTracker
A class for managing all the room instances
SocketManager
A class for setting up a server socket and starting them in their own threads
